saas.name: Left Pad
saas.heading: Left Pad as a Service
saas.subheading: A revolutionary API that pads strings to the left.

features.name: Support Open Source
features.desc: All proceeds will be donated to open source projects on [Open Collective](https://opencollective.com).

features.name: Simple
features.desc: We're so focused on simplicity that we almost forgot to add functionality.

features.name: Get Going Fast
features.desc: We don't really do anything, so setup is a breeze.

features.name: Documentation
features.desc: The most extensive API docs you'll never use.

features.name: Support
features.desc: Please, please don't actually contact us.

features.name: Saasify
features.desc: This API serves as both an April Fool's joke as well as an example of what you can build with [Saasify](http://saasify.sh).

pricingPlans.name: Unlimited
features: All proceeds will be donated to open source.
